verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6485>visited<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> as he had <S%H559>said<s%>, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> unto <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> as he had <S%H1696>spoken<s%>.

For <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H2029>conceived<s%>, and <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> in his old <S%H2208>age<s%>, at the set <S%H4150>time<s%> of which <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to him.
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H1121>son<s%> that was <S%H3205>born<s%> unto him, whom <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H3205>bare<s%> to him, <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>.
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> being <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>, as <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him.
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> was an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>, when his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> was <S%H3205>born<s%> unto him.
And <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H6213>made<s%> me to <S%H6712>laugh<s%>, so that all that <S%H8085>hear<s%> will <S%H6711>laugh<s%> with me.

And she <S%H559>said<s%>, Who would have <S%H4448>said<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, that <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> should have given <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H3243>suck<s%>? for I have <S%H3205>born<s%> him a <S%H1121>son<s%> in his old <S%H2208>age<s%>.

And the <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H1431>grew<s%>, and was <S%H1580>weaned<s%>: and <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4960>feast<s%> the same <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> was <S%H1580>weaned<s%>.
And <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%>, which she had <S%H3205>born<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, <S%H6711>mocking<s%>.

Wherefore she <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, Cast <S%H1644>out<s%> this <S%H519>bondwoman<s%> and her <S%H1121>son<s%>: for the <S%H1121>son<s%> of this <S%H519>bondwoman<s%> shall not be <S%H3423>heir<s%> with my <S%H1121>son<s%>, even with <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>thing<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3415>grievous<s%> in <S%H85>Abraham's<s%> <S%H5869>sight<s%> <S%H182>because<s%> of his <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, Let it not be <S%H3415>grievous<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%> because of the <S%H5288>lad<s%>, and because of thy <S%H519>bondwoman<s%>; in all that <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> hath <S%H559>said<s%> unto thee, <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto her <S%H6963>voice<s%>; for in <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> shall thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> be <S%H7121>called<s%>.
And also of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H519>bondwoman<s%> will I <S%H7760>make<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%>, because he is thy <S%H2233>seed<s%>.

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and a <S%H2573>bottle<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it unto <S%H1904>Hagar<s%>, <S%H7760>putting<s%> it on her <S%H7926>shoulder<s%>, and the <S%H3206>child<s%>, and sent her <S%H7971>away<s%>: and she <S%H3212>departed<s%>, and <S%H8582>wandered<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H884>Beersheba<s%>.
And the <S%H4325>water<s%> was <S%H3615>spent<s%> <S%H4480>in<s%> the <S%H2573>bottle<s%>, and she <S%H7993>cast<s%> the <S%H3206>child<s%> under <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H7880>shrubs<s%>.

And she <S%H3212>went<s%>, and sat her <S%H3427>down<s%> over <S%H5048>against<s%> him a good way <S%H7368>off<s%>, as it were a <S%H2909>bowshot<s%> <S%H7198><s%>: for she <S%H559>said<s%>, Let me not <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H3206>child<s%>. And she <S%H3427>sat<s%> over against him, and lift <S%H5375>up<s%> her <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and <S%H1058>wept<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H5288>lad<s%>; and the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> out of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, What aileth thee, <S%H1904>Hagar<s%>? <S%H3372>fear<s%> not; for <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H5288>lad<s%> where he is.
<S%H6965>Arise<s%>, lift <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H5288>lad<s%>, and <S%H2388>hold<s%> him in thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>; for I will <S%H7760>make<s%> him a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6491>opened<s%> her <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and she <S%H7200>saw<s%> a <S%H875>well<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>; and she <S%H3212>went<s%>, and <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H2573>bottle<s%> with <S%H4325>water<s%>, and <S%H8248>gave<s%> the <S%H5288>lad<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%>.
And <S%H430>God<s%> was with the <S%H5288>lad<s%>; and he <S%H1431>grew<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and became an <S%H7235>archer<s%> <S%H7199><s%>.
And he <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6290>Paran<s%>: and his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> him a <S%H802>wife<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And it came to pass at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, that <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> and <S%H6369>Phichol<s%> the chief <S%H8269>captain<s%> of his <S%H6635>host<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> is with thee in all that thou <S%H6213>doest<s%>:

Now therefore <S%H7650>swear<s%> unto me <S%H2008>here<s%> by <S%H430>God<s%> that thou wilt not deal <S%H8266>falsely<s%> with me, nor with my <S%H5209>son<s%>, nor with my son's <S%H5220>son<s%>: but according to the <S%H2617>kindness<s%> that I have <S%H6213>done<s%> unto thee, thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> unto me, and to the <S%H776>land<s%> wherein thou hast <S%H1481>sojourned<s%>. that thou: Heb. if thou shalt lie unto me
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H7650>swear<s%>.

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3198>reproved<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H182>because<s%> of a <S%H875>well<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>, which <S%H40>Abimelech's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> had violently taken <S%H1497>away<s%>.

And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, I <S%H3045>wot<s%> not who hath <S%H6213>done<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%>: <S%H3808>neither<s%> didst thou <S%H5046>tell<s%> me, <S%H3808>neither<s%> yet <S%H8085>heard<s%> I of it, <S%H1115>but<s%> to <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them unto <S%H40>Abimelech<s%>; and both of <S%H8147>them<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5324>set<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> ewe <S%H3535>lambs<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> by themselves.
And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, <S%H2008>What<s%> mean these <S%H7651>seven<s%> ewe <S%H3535>lambs<s%> which thou hast <S%H5324>set<s%> by themselves?

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, For these <S%H7651>seven<s%> ewe <S%H3535>lambs<s%> shalt thou <S%H3947>take<s%> of my <S%H3027>hand<s%>, <S%H5668>that<s%> they may be a <S%H5713>witness<s%> unto me, that I have <S%H2658>digged<s%> this <S%H875>well<s%>.
Wherefore he <S%H7121>called<s%> that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H884>Beersheba<s%>; because there they <S%H7650>sware<s%> both of <S%H8147>them<s%>. Beersheba: that is, The well of the oath

Thus they <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> at <S%H884>Beersheba<s%>: then <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%>, and <S%H6369>Phichol<s%> the chief <S%H8269>captain<s%> of his <S%H6635>host<s%>, and they <S%H7725>returned<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>.

And Abraham <S%H5193>planted<s%> a <S%H815>grove<s%> in <S%H884>Beersheba<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> there on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>. grove: or, tree
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H1481>sojourned<s%> in the <S%H6430>Philistines'<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.
